titlestmt.titleproper:
Guide to the Herbert H. Lehman Letter to Jacob Billikopf
1929 November 8
AHMC - Lehman, Herbert
titlestmt.author: Larry Weimer

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 15:47:02 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Herbert H. Lehman letter to Jacob Billikopf
did.abstract: Typed, signed letter from Herbert H. Lehman, on his stationery, to Jacob Billikopf at the Federation of Jewish Charities in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Lehman, then Lieutenant Governor-elect of New York, acknowledges Billikopf's "wonderful" friendship and expresses gratitude for his help in the election. Though not specific as to the nature of that help, Lehman considered it a valuable contribution to the vote in New York City and upstate. For more information and to request this item, see the catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
